lead_paragraph: In THE NEW YORK TIMES Magazine an article by J. B. Priestley warns the world against hate and counsels wisdom as a means of victory. Mr. Priestley lays the ground for his exposition by saying that making people conscious of war may be overdone, and "in any event propaganda of this kind can never become the solid foundation of morale."
abstract: Lrs on J B Priestley article on morale strengthening
